name: Blue: Mono
description:
You find yourself appearing in someone's room. It is normal for you, but they definitely are scared. You can leave, or you can make yourself at home.

  Made for the Narrative Driven Jam #6  

Thank you very very much for the opportunity! 

-=-=-=-
I didn't expect to be able to finish the game in 10 days, but I actually did something, phewww! It is a combination with working at school, and potentially slacking off.

While the game is lacking in many aspects, at the end of the day it's still a great learning experience. Game dev is fun, really.

-=---=-

There are 3 endings.  Have fun playing!

That's all I have to say. Hope you enjoy this mundane short game.
